EVENTS_MESSAGECREATE_COOLDOWN: Please wait for {{timeLeft}} more second(s) before reusing the `{{command}}` command.
EVENTS_MESSAGECREATE_REQUIRED_ARGS:
This command requires **arguments**.
:white_small_square: Proper Usage: `{{prefix}}{{command}} {{usage}}`
:white_small_square: For more informations please refer to `{{prefix}}help {{command}}`
EVENTS_MESSAGECREATE_GUILD_ONLY:
This command is unavailable via private message.
Please run this command within a server.
EVENTS_MESSAGECREATE_COMMAND_ERROR: Whoops. Something went wrong. Try again in some minutes. If the error persists make sure to report it.
COMMAND_DESCRIPTIONS_CRAFT: Returns the crafting resources for a ship.
COMMAND_DESCRIPTIONS_ORES: Returns the locations for certain ores.
COMMAND_DESCRIPTIONS_PATTERNS: Returns the patterns for the different events.
COMMAND_DESCRIPTIONS_SHIPLOOT: Returns the loot for a ship.
COMMAND_DESCRIPTIONS_STATS: Returns the statistics for a player.
COMMAND_DESCRIPTIONS_INVITE: Returns a link to invite the bot.
CONFIG_CONFIGURATION_HELP:
Update the configuration with **`*config <index> [ value | "--reset" ]`**
Or use (**/**)Slash Commands.
Prefixes based on the message content will be deprecated soon.
CONFIG_CONFIGURATION_ERROR:
Whoops. Wrong syntax.
:white_small_square: Correct Usage `{{prefix}}config <index> [ value | "--reset" ]`
CONFIG_MISSING_PERMISSIONS: Hold up! You need the Administrator / Manage Server permission.
CONFIG_1_RESET:
Time Zone has been reset to `Greenwich`.
Local Time:
CONFIG_1_SUCESS:
Time Zone has been set to `{{Timezone}}`.
Local Time: `{{Timestamp}}`
CONFIG_1_INVALID_TIMEZONE: Invalid timezone given. All valid options can be found [here](https://github.com/The-Red-Circle/moment-timezones/blob/main/timeZones.js).
CONFIG_2_INVALID_LANGUAGE: Invalid language given. All valid options are : `en-US` and `ru-RU`.
CONFIG_3_SUCESS: Your ingame nickname has been set to `{{name}}`.
CONFIG_3_INVALID_NICKNAME: The name has to be 2 to 16 symbols long and consist of Latin letters and digits.
CONFIG_4_RESET: Events have been reset to default (`None`).
CONFIG_4_SUCESS_ALL_EVENTS:
Alright, the following ingame events will trigger a notification.
▫️`Special Operations`
▫️`Conquest`
▫️`Brawl`
▫️`Portals`
CONFIG_4_SUCESS_EVENTLIST_TITLE:
Alright, the following ingame events will trigger a notification.
{{events}}
CONFIG_4_DISABLE_EVENTLIST_TITLE:
Alright, the following ingame events are now disabled.
{{events}}
CONFIG_4_INVALID_EVENTS:
None of the provided events are valid.
The following events are valid: `specialOperation`, `brawl`, `conquest`, `portals`
CONFIG_4_SUCESS_DISABLE_ALL_EVENTS: Alright, all events disabled. You won't receive **any** notifications.
CONFIG_7_RESET: Notification Channel has been reset to default (`None`).
CONFIG_7_NO_CHANNEL_PERMISSIONS:
I don't have access to this channel.
Please grant me the necessary permissions for this channel or choose another one.
CONFIG_7_NO_WEBHOOK_PERMISSIONS: Please grant me the necessary permission `Manage Webhooks` to use this command.
CONFIG_7_WEBHOOK_TEST: Notifications for ingame events will be sent in here.
CONFIG_8_RESET: NotificationRole has been reset to default (`None`).
LOOT_NO_SHIP_TIP:
**Tip**: Replace spaces with -
**Example**: Object NY18 -> object-ny18
ORE_NO_ORE_TIP:
**Tip**: Replace spaces with -
**Example**: Crystal Shard -> crystal-shard
BOTINFO_DESCRIPTION:
Small side project to keep track of the different ingame events of the game [Star Conflict](https://star-conflict.com/en).

*Join the support server for suggestions / support.*
CRAFT_HELP_DESCRIPTION: Returns the crafting resources for a ship.
CRAFT_NO_SHIP: This ship doesn't exists or it isn't craftable.
HELP_OFFICAL_DESCRIPTION:
This is an official bot for the Game [Star Conflict](https://star-conflict.com/en).
It will send a notification via direct messages if certain ingame events start.
Use `{{prefix}}help <command>` for more info about a specific command.
HELP_NO_COMMAND_FOUND:
I could not find the command: {{command}}**

Help Command Usage: 
`{{prefix}}help` -  lists all commands
`{{prefix}}help [command]` - provides help for a command.
PATTERNS_CONQUEST_DESCRIPTION:
**Sector Conquest** represents battles between corporations on the sector map. For conquering and holding a location the corporation will earn an income.
For more informations read [this wiki entry](https://wiki.star-conflict.com/index.php?title=Sector_Conquest).
PATTERNS_BRAWL_DESCRIPTION:
All mercenaries can test their forces in special modes — brawls.
Each brawl has different special conditions and rules.
**You can take part in brawls for a limited time:**
• `01:00-03:00 GMT`
• `10:00-12:00 GMT`
• `14:00-16:00 GMT`
• `18:00-19:00 GMT`
• `20:00-22:00 GMT`
**Brawl patterns change every day:**
• Beetle in the anthill — Monday
• Fight club — Tuesday
• Last man standing — Wednesday
• Fight club — Thursday
• Combat recon — available on Fridays
• Beacon Capture — available on Saturdays
On Sundays, the brawl modes will alternate.

For more informations read [this wiki entry](https://wiki.star-conflict.com/index.php?title=Brawl#Brawls).
PATTERNS_SPECOPS_DESCRIPTION:
Elite UMC mercenary squad welcomes you!
We're blasting Aliens across all the human sectors! We're trusted with the most dangerous, almost impossible missions. And the most profitable of course.
**You can take part in special operations for a limited time:**
• `00:00-01:00 GMT`
• `02:00-03:00 GMT`
• `04:00-05:00 GMT`
• `06:00-07:00 GMT`
• `08:00-09:00 GMT`
• `10:00-11:00 GMT`
• `12:00-13:00 GMT`
• `14:00-15:00 GMT`
• `16:00-17:00 GMT`
• `18:00-19:00 GMT`
• `20:00-21:00 GMT`
• `22:00-23:00 GMT`

**Special Operation patterns change every day:**
• `The Alien Destroyer` — Tuesday, Saturday, Sunday
• `The Defiler` — Wednesday, Friday, Sunday
• `Return to Eden` — Monday, Thursday, Sunday
On Sundays, the Special Operation will alternate.

For more informations read [this wiki entry](https://wiki.star-conflict.com/index.php?title=SPECIAL_OPERATIONS).
PATTERNS_INVALID_SEARCH: No value specified, possible options are: brawl, portals, specialOperation and conquest.

All mercenaries can test their forces in special modes — brawls.
Each br

For more informations run the patterns command or read [this wiki entry](https://wiki.star-conflict.com/index.php?title=Brawl#Brawls).
NOTIFICATION_CONQUEST_TITLE:
Sector Conquest is starting.
Time Zone: `{{timeStamp}}`
NOTIFICATION_CONQUEST_DESCRIPTION:
**Sector Conquest** represents battles between corporations on the sector map.
For conquering and holding a location the corporation will earn an income.

For more informations run the patterns command or read [this wiki entry](https://wiki.star-conflict.com/index.php?title=Sector_Conquest).
NOTIFICATION_PORTALS_DESCRIPTION:
Mysterious spatial tunnels leading to various locations of space have been detected in the “Shining” zone.
The fight has begun! Only the strongest teams and the best pilots will be able to control the tunnels and get valuable resources!

For more informations run the patterns command or read [this wiki entry](https://wiki.star-conflict.com/index.php?title=Portals#Portals).
NOTIFICATION_SPECOPS_TITLE:
Special Operations are starting.
Time Zone: `{{timeStamp}}`
NOTIFICATION_SPECOPS_DESCRIPTION:
Elite UMC mercenary squad welcomes you!
We're blasting Aliens across all the human sectors! We're trusted with the most dangerous, almost impossible missions. And the most profitable of course.

For more informations run the patterns command or read [this wiki entry](https://wiki.star-conflict.com/index.php?title=SPECIAL_OPERATIONS).
